instructions: Stir ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, honey, butter, mustard, lemon juice, chili powder, and garlic powder together in a saucepan over medium heat; simmer until hot, about 5 minutes.
title: Barbeque Sauce for Meat Sandwiches
steps: Stir ketchup, brown sugar, Worcestershire sauce, honey, butter, mustard, lemon juice, chili powder, and garlic powder together in a saucepan over medium heat; simmer until hot, about 5 minutes.
